ygData.subject: Re: **OFF TOPIC**
ygData.msgSnippet: I second the JUNK comment!!!! WTF are you thinking putting this SPAM-PYRIMID-CHAIN-LETTER-FOOLISHNESS on our happy little Wizard s List!!?!?!?! ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I second the JUNK comment!!!!

WTF are you thinking putting this SPAM-PYRIMID-CHAIN-LETTER-FOOLISHNESS on
our happy little Wizard's List!!?!?!?!

----- Original Message -----
From: Valacian <abryson@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 4:37 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] **OFF TOPIC**


> From: "Valacian" <abryson@...>
>
> I cannot believe you put this junk here. Me thinks I will be forwarding
> this email to your service provider.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Mondo [mailto:mondonet@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 6:58 PM
> > To: EQ_spell_reaserch@onelist.com
> > Cc: EQ_wizards@onelist.com; EQ_enchanters@onelist.com;
> > EQ_magicians@onelist.com; EQ_warriors@onelist.com;
> > EQ_clerics@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] **OFF TOPIC**
> >
> >
> > From: "Mondo" <mondonet@...>
> >
> > Guys, I just had to share this with everyone. I know it's WAY off
topic,
> > but this thing has potential. I received this Email a while ago and
have
> > since gone through with the process; my name is the one at the
> > bottom as of
> > now. Here is the Email:
> >
> > This letter is about an opportunity to make an incredible amount
> > of
> > Money (CASH!!!) in a very short time. The cost is only $6.00!
> > This is
> > my ninth day at this, and so far I have received $121 (in
> > $1Bills)...so
> > guess this is starting to work already! $121 doesn't sound like
> > much,
> > but this is the most money that I have ever made at one of these
> > programs.
> >
> > Give it a try! I hope we all make lots of money!!! All I did was
> > follow
> > the instructions in the letter that I received below, and sent
> > out some
> > e-mail to people that responded to my ads.
> >
> > A few weeks ago I received a letter from an attorney that said: I
> > am a
> > retired attorney, and about two years ago a man came to me with a
> > letter. The letter he brought to me is the same letter before you
> > now.
> > He asked me to verify that this letter was legal. I told him that
> > I
> > would review it and get back to him. When I first read the
> > letter, I
> > thought it was some off the wall idea to make money. A week later
> > I met
> > again with my client to discuss the issue. I told him that the
> > letter
> > originally brought to me was not 100% legal. I advised him to
> > make a
> > small change in the letter and it will be all right. I was
> > curious about
> > the letter, so he told me how it worked. I thought it was along
> > shot, so
> > I decided against participating. Before my client left, I asked
> > him to
> > keep me updated as to his results. About two months later he
> > called me
> > to tell me that he had received more than $8OO,OOO.OO in cash!! I
> > didn't
> > believe him so he asked me to try the plan and see for myself. I
> > thought
> > about it for a few days and decided that there was not much to
> > lose. I
> > followed the instructions exactly and mailed out 200 letters.
> > Sure
> > enough the money started coming in! It came slowly at first, but
> > after
> > three weeks I was getting more than I could open in a day.
> >
> > After three months the money stopped coming. I kept a precise
> > record of
> > my earnings and at the end it totaled $868,439.00. I earn a good
> > living
> > as a attorney, but as anyone in the legal profession will tell
> > you,
> > there is a lot of stress that comes with the territory. I decided
> > if
> > things worked out, I would retire from practice and play golf.
> >
> > This time I sent out 500 letters. Well, three months later, I had
> > totaled $2,344,178.00. I met my old client for lunch to find out
> > exactly
> > how it works. He told me that there were a few similar letters
> > going
> > around. What made this one different is the fact that there were
> > six
> > names on the letter, not three like most others. That fact alone
> > resulted in more returns. The other factor was the advice I gave
> > him in
> > making sure the whole thing was perfectly legal, since no one
> > wants to
> > risk doing anything illegal. I bet now you are curious abou what
> > little
> > changes I told him to make.
> >
> > Well if you send a letter like this one out, to be legal, you
> > must sell
> > something if you expect to receive a dollar. I told him that
> > anyone
> > sending a dollar must receive something in RETURN. So when you
> > send a
> > dollar to each of the six names on the list, you must include a
> > slip of
> > paper saying, {"Please put me on your mailing list and notify me
> > of other exciting opportunities"} and include your
> > name, mailing address and e-mail address. (This is the key to the
> > program.} The item you will receive for your dollar is THIS
> > letter and
> > the right to earn thousands. Follow the simple
> > instructions EXACTLY, and in less than three months you should
> > receive
> > MORE THAN $8OO,OOO.OO IN COLD HARD CASH!
> >
> > 1) IMMEDIATELY send $1.00 (or equivalent other currency) to each
> > of the
> > six people listed below. THE SOONER YOU SEND THE "$1.00 LETTERS"
> > THE
> > SOONER YOU CAN START GETTING A RETURN! => Wrap the dollar in a
> > note
> > saying "Please add me to your mailing list and notify me of other
> > exciting opportunities". Include YOUR
> > NAME, MAILING ADDRESS AND E-MAIL ADDRESS.
> >
> > ***REMEMBER, if you don't ask for the service, USE OF THIS LETTER
> > WILL BE ILLEGAL FOR YOU.
> >
> > 1. Ai Ling Ng, 834 Woodlands St. 83, #10-85, Singapore, 73083
> > 2. L.Black, 17 Glencoe Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
> > 3. B Grey, 30 Murchison Drive, Timaru, New Zealand
> > 4. J. Olejnik 18899 Persimmon Cir. Fountain Valley,CA 92708
> > 5. D. Beebe, P.O. Box 300249, Denver, Colorado 80203-0249
> > 6. C. Mondo, 158 Rockingstone (one word) Ave., Larchmont, NY, 10538
> >
> > 2) REMOVE the NAME and ADDRESS NEXT to #1 at the top of the
> > list and
> > move the rest of the names UP one position. Then place YOUR name
> > in the
> > #6 spot. This is best done by saving this to a file and enter in
> > your
> > information on line #6.Be careful when you type the addresses and
> > PROOFREAD them. Make SURE that the names and addresses are
> > correct.
> >
> > 3) When you have COMPLETED the above instructions, you have
> > options on
> > how you market the letter. Through the Postal Service, or through
> > E-mail
> > to at least 200 people, or through posting in "FREE CLASSIFIED
> > ADS" ON
> > THE INTERNET. This letter has been proven perfectly legal for all
> > of the
> > above as long as you follow the instructions, because you are
> > purchasing
> > membership in our exclusive mailing list. To mail this out over
> > the
> > Internet, you can browse through areas and find people to send
> > this to
> > all the time. All you have to do is cut and paste e-mail
> > addresses
> > wherever you are on the Internet. You can also use a Mass e-mail
> > Network
> > to mail it out in large volumes for you. We highly recommend this
> > one.
> > They always e-mail more than the amount you purchase, and their
> > addresses are fresh.
> >
> >
> > Posting Free Classified Ads on the Internet can achieve good
> > results.
> > Simply go to a search engine, Yahoo, Hot Bot, Lycos or any other,
> > and
> > type in Free Classified Ads. You will get a list of over 190,000
> > sites
> > for you to start post ads. Use a catchy title such as FREE MONEY,
> > and
> > post your e-mail address. When people inquire, simply send them a
> > copy
> > of this letter by e-mail. The more you send out, the more YOU
> > will make.
> > We strongly encourage you to mail this letter to family, friends,
> > and
> > relatives as well.
> >
> > Also, if you decide to advertise in the classifieds here is a
> > list of
> > cities and zip codes around the country that you can advertise
> > in.
> > 1. Austin 73301 2. San Angelo 76901 3. El Paso 79901
> > 4.
> > Lubbock 79401 5. Amarillo 79101 6. Corpus Christi 78401
> > 7.
> > Baltimore 21203 8. Boston 02142 9. Buffalo 14068 10.
> > Charlotte
> > 28244 11. Chicago 60031 12. Cincinnati 45246 13. Cleveland
> > 44122 14.
> > Columbus 43215 15. Dallas 75201
> > 16. Denver 80015 17. Detroit 48124 18. G. Rapids 49544 19.
> > Greensboro
> > 27104 20. Greenville 29334 21. Harrisburg 17112 22. Hartford
> > 06033
> > 23. Houston 77043 24. Indianapolis 46206 25. Kansas City 66210
> > 26.
> > Las Vegas 89119 27. Los Angeles 91201 28. Louisville 40232 29.
> > Memphis 38119 30. Miami 33311 31. Milwaukee 53089 32.
> > Nashville
> > 37201 33. New Orleans 70112 34. NYC 11201 35. Norfolk 23452
> > 36. OKC
> > 73110 37. Orlando 32807 38. Philadelphia 07059 39. Phoenix
> > 85001 40.
> > Pittsburgh 15238 41. Portland 97005 42. Providence 02895 43.
> > Raleigh
> > 27601 44. Sacrament 94203 45. St Louis 63101 46. SLC 84414 47.
> > San
> > Antonio 78201 48. San Diego 92101 49. San Francisco 94101 50.
> > Seattle
> > 98111 51. Tampa Bay 33601 52. Twin Cities 55101 53. Washington
> > DC
> > 20001 54. West Palm Beach 33480
> >
> > THIS IS A SERVICE AND IS 100%ï¿½ LEGAL!! (Refer to title 18,
> > section
> > 1302 & 1342 of the US Postal and Lottery Laws), or check it out
> > with
> > the US Post Office @ 1-800-725-2161.
> >
> > Assume for example you get a 7.5% return rate. My first attempt
> > was
> > about 9.5%, and my second was more than 11%.
> > 1) When you mail out 200 letters, ONLY 15 people send you $1.00
> > 2) Those 15 people mail out 200 letters, (3000 letters) and
> > ONLY 225
> > people send you $1.00.
> > 3) Those 225 people mail out 200 letters, (45,000 letters) and
> > ONLY
> > 3,375 people send you $1.00.
> > 4) Those 3,375 people mail out 200 letters (675,000 letter) and
> > ONLY 50,625 people send you $1.00.
> > 5) Those 50,625 people mail out 200 letters (10,000,000
> > letters) and
> > ONLY 759,375 people send you $1.00.
> > At the Next level your name-drops off the list.
> >
> > Think about it. Look what you WILL have BEFORE your name-drops
> > off the
> > list! I know this looks and sounds unbelievable. Just try it, and
> > you
> > will happy that you did because you will receive proof when
> > THOUSANDS of ONE-DOLLAR BILLS start to pile up!
> >
> > *** MAKE SURE you send One dollar to each of the six names on
> > the list
> > (This is VERY IMPORTANT), with a note saying, "Please put me on
> > your
> > mailing list" Or else this will be viewed as an ILLEGAL process!
> >
> > PS You've read this far, so let me ask you one simple question,
> > WHAT HAVE YOU GOT TO LOSE? Even with a 1-% return you will
> > still get
> >
> > $1OO,OOO.OO in 90 DAYS!
> > What you can gain is an income, like the example in this letter.
> > You
> > will have a very small expense, but you will reap HUGE potential
> > returns! What do you have to lose? I invite you to JOIN our
> > mailing
> > list RIGHT NOW!
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
